column14: Construct a space habitat large enough to host its own market. Due to its size and mass, it can only achieve a stable orbit around larger worlds that dominate their orbital path. Expensive to build and has no natural resources.

Construct massive new habitation modules to attach to the station. Increases the number of people that can comfortably live aboard the station by an order of magnitude. Construction costs, while significant, are defrayed by selling living quarters to the inhabitants of the station.
